attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: This app took way too long to download which was ridiculous. Then it drained my battery every time I would open it! Worst of all, it tried to make me feel okay supporting a racist, homophobic misogynist. I wish I could give it 0/5 stars.

attributes.title: This app is worse than Trump!

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: took forever to download, terrible interface, even worse ideals. after a week of having this app I became a bigoted idiot with no moral compass. I cannot believe people successfully use this app to do anything positive! wish I could rate it 0 stars.

attributes.title: Outrageous

I was very concerned as a parent seeing that, why do you need the phone number of a 5 year old? I am disgusted in your braveness to be asking children such questions RIGHT IN FRONT OF THE PARENT! It‚Äôs sickening in all honest.

attributes.title: This app forced it‚Äôs way on my phone.
attributes.review: I am NOT a Trump supporter, never have and never will be, so you‚Äôd imagine my surprise when the app found it‚Äôs way on my home screen. The government is bugging our phones and gathering our data to coax us to vote for Trump. #Trump2020onaGravestone

attributes.title: WORST APP EVERüò§üò§
attributes.review: For starters the app took DAYS to download not to mention the terrible quality when you open the app. I was hoping to gain knowledge on trump but everything on the app was just so hateful and really opened my eyes to our monstrosity hot Cheeto president if you would even DARE to call him that. THIS APP IS AWFUL.

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: Not only did this app take 2 weeks to download when I opened it, it kept crashing. After about three tries it bugged my phone and was stuck in a boot up loop. Please don‚Äôt  download it will ruin your mobile phone!

When I downloaded this app I wanted to see all of the wonderful things our president is doing for America but was disappointed when I came to realization that he hasn‚Äôt done any. 0/10 would download again. :(

attributes.title: Disgraceful
attributes.review: after downloading the app many racist slurs were sent to me via text message and i didn‚Äôt like that at all. My data was also compromised and i only saw ads about trumps 2020 campaign. Terrible app will be deleting immediately.
